bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1995.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: 1. Progress in the Peristyle-House. - 2. The wine-press to the east of the Double Bath. - 3. A residential building on the north of the Pilgrimage Court. - 4. The later mediaeval settlement.
GROSSMANN Peter, Felix ARNOLD and Jacek KOSCIUK, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Spring 1995.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 36 (1997) pp. 83-98, 5 plans et 5 pll.
